Constructor Detail

MP3PreparedVote

public MP3PreparedVote(MP3Parameters param,
                       int nCandidates,
                       java.math.BigInteger pledgeValue,
                       java.util.Random r,
                       boolean validity,
                       java.lang.String hashFunction)
                throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
Prepares a MarkPledge3 vote

Parameters:
param - MarkPledge3 public election parameters
nCandidates - number of candidates running in election (must be >=2)
pledgeValue - pledge value to use in the vote preparation
r - source of randomness to use in the vote preparation
validity - if true a validity proof is created
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
java.security.InvalidParameterException - if nCandidades < 2

getVoteAndReceipt

public final MP3VoteAndReceipt getVoteAndReceipt(java.math.BigInteger chal,
                                                 int selectionIndex)
Builds the public/voter verifiable vote encryption based on the challenge received. THIS METHOD SHOULD ONLY BE CALLED ONCE because the MP3CandidateVoteEncryption only opens for the first time(first value of chal). The subsequent calls will return the value of the first call, i.e. the chal and selectionIndex of the 2º and subsequent calls are ignored.

Parameters:
chal -
selectionIndex - the index of the selected candidate (0 to number of candidates -1)
Returns:
the public/voter verifiable vote encryption

prepareVoteAndReceipt

private final void prepareVoteAndReceipt(java.math.BigInteger chal,
                                         int selectionIndex)
Builds the public/voter verifiable vote encryption based on the challenge received. This method should only be called once because the MP3CandidateVoteEncryption only opens for the first time/first value of chal.

Parameters:
chal -
selectionIndex - the index of the selected candidate (0 to number of candidates -1)

getHash

public final byte[] getHash(java.lang.String hashAlgorithm)
                     throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
This method returns the hash of the encryptions of the prepared vote (no random factors, nor verification values). It uses the method getCandideVotesHash of the MP3VoteFactory class

Parameters:
hashAlgorithm - hash algorithm
Returns:
the hash of the prepared vote (only candidate vote and commit encryptions are considered)
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the hashAlgorithm is not supported
